sentence.Network_en: Young people tend to look at the world through rose - colored glasses.
sentence.Network_cn: 年轻人步入生活,倾向于以过分乐观的眼光看待世界.

sentence.Network_en: Unfortunately, the administration's rose - colored forecast has muddied this picture.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸的是, 政府乐观的预测已经使这幅图案暗淡下来了.

sentence.Network_en: It's like seeing San Francisco through rose - colored glasses, bright and cheerful.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就像透过玫瑰色眼镜看旧金山, 显得光明而欢乐.
